name: ETM Petraefa Presents: Running For Space
name_original: ETM Petraefa Presents: Running For Space
description:
My Submission for the Epic MegaJam 2021

Test your tapping skills as you race as a pair of shoes in a best out of three rounds event and earn your space on the shelves.

Thanks to the Unreal Discord gamejam channel for being so cool and friendly and supportative during this jam. It's been and honor to take part in this challenge and and honor to be amongst so many awesome people.

I would like to keep building on this and add more events such as long jump and high jump events and also an endurance event. The timeframe was too short for me as noob but i had so much fun and learnt so much. The first game i have ever made from start to finish using my own methods. (Definitely not the best, but opened my eyes to what is possible)

What started as a simple race ended up being extremely complicated for me and at times i wanted to just delete the ai hahaha. But the lucky little bastard hung in there and in the end even showed me that he could be even tougher (Easy to hard)

I play-tested it so many times trying to get the times and sounds right that i reget that I wasn't able to add a save record time so others could see but please screenshot your best times and share them. My personal best was 5:60 :P

I do plan on adding multiplayer later on but I'm still a noob so don't expect it too soon.

A big thanks and shoutout to all the sponsors for all the awesome stuff they sponsored for the jam and a huge shoutout to epic for just being EPIC.
